meanings.definition: A synthetic corticosteroid drug used to treat inflammation and autoimmune conditions.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed prednisones to reduce the swelling in my joints.
meanings.sent2: Prednisones are commonly used to manage symptoms of arthritis.
meanings.sent3: After taking prednisones, I felt like a deflated balloon, but in a good way!
meanings.sent4: Her body welcomed the prednisones like a soothing balm for her inflamed skin.
meanings.sent5: The prednisones worked their magic, calming the storm of inflammation within me.
